mapper.insert: insert into productList(productNum, productName, productPrice, productDescription, regDate, thumbnailPath) values( (seq_ProductNum.NEXTVAL), #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productDescription}, (to_date(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:SS')), #{thumbnailPath} )
mapper.select: select productNum, productName, productPrice, productDescription, regDate, thumbnailPath from productList order by productNum desc
